snippet: MISSETT, IV--Joseph Vincent, M.D. Died suddenly of a heart attack on Friday, July 8, 2016 in Santa Monica, California. He was 50. Born October 13, 1965 in New York City, he graduated from The Buckley School, Middlesex School and Emory University. ...
lead_paragraph: MISSETT, IV--Joseph Vincent, M.D. Died suddenly of a heart attack on Friday, July 8, 2016 in Santa Monica, California. He was 50. Born October 13, 1965 in New York City, he graduated from The Buckley School, Middlesex School and Emory University. After a successful career on Wall Street, "JV" found his true calling and became a doctor specializing in emergency medicine. He practiced this specialty at a number of hospitals in Arizona over the course of his career. An immensely popular person, JV will be remembered by his many friends for his humor, kindness, compassion and generosity of spirit. JV was predeceased by his mother Barbara, and his stepson Anthony. He is survived by his wife Carol, son Santiago and stepson Emilio, his father Joe and stepmother Nancy, his brother Stephen and his wife Heidi, his stepbrother Henry and his wife Whitney, his stepsister Samantha and her husband John, and his many nephews, a niece, and godchildren. In lieu of flowers, contributions in JV's memory may be made to the Central Park Medical Unit, PO Box 440 New York, NY 10028 or CPMU.com. 1/3
